name: Boost
description: Boost is a next-generation engagement platform that bridges Web2 and Web3 by enabling brands, creators, and communities to drive authentic, gamified social interactions, all powered by the $BOOST token. Users earn points and rewards by completing tasks such as follows, likes, on-chain actions, and app usage. $BOOST serves as a utility and incentive token for both users and campaign creators, supporting rewards, multipliers, and exclusive experiences. Boost and Alphabot have already onboarded millions of users and distributed over $1.4B in rewards, making it the most widely used platform of its kind.
